# RobotEconomist

### Pipeline
- Preprocess corpus (e.g. `nber`) from `data/nber/` to `data/nber/spacy`
- Extract possible regressors, instruments and outcome variables to jsonl?
- Vectorize variables
- Search over vectors to make a possible dag
- Query the dag

### Set up machine 

`brew install git-lfs`

`brew install jq`
